item.title: Connexion SSH par certificat
item.description: Cet article détaille comment se connecter sur un système distant par certificat. Génération clé # ssh-keygen -t rsa Generating public/private rsa key pair. Enter file in which to save the key (/root/.ssh/id_rsa): Created directory '/root/.ssh'. Enter passphrase (empty for no passphrase): Enter same passphrase again: Your identification has been saved in /root/.ssh/id_rsa. Your public key has been saved in /root/.ssh/id_rsa.pub. The key fingerprint is: c7:da:800:22:9e:a1:1f root@automation The key's randomart image is: +--[ RSA 2048]----+ | | | .
